name: Last Breath (nikrath)
description:
"It was 10 days ago...

Aliens from our neighboring planet attacked us and started destroying our planet...

our species did not have much fighters , so the citizens planned to evacuate the planet.

while they were evacuating,

the little amount of warriors that this planet had, including me, fought the aliens to buy the citizens some time to escape.

these aliens have destroyed most of our planet, and all the warriors except me have been killed...

our planet has been almost destroyed, but i will still fight to defend whatever the little world of ours that is left, until my last breath..."
